<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This class implements SPIRV-specific bits of TargetFrameLowering class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The target uses only virtual registers. It does not operate with stack frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicitly and does not generate prologues/epilogues of functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As a result, we are not required to implemented the frame lowering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functionality substantially.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
